trans-unit.source: The abstract base class from which all persistence services are derived.
trans-unit.target: Abstrakt basisklasse som er avledet services fra som alle utholdenhet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When certain conditions occur while the workflow is running, the workflow runtime engine persists state information about the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Når visse betingelser er oppfylt mens arbeidsflyten pågår, vedvarer arbeidsflyten runtime motoren Tilstandsinformasjon om arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Persistence can occur, for example, when an atomic transaction finishes, when the workflow instance becomes idle, when the host calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Unload%2A?displayProperty=fullName> on the workflow instance, or when a workflow instance is terminated or finishes.
trans-unit.target: Utholdenhet kan forekomme, for eksempel når du er ferdig atomic transaksjonen, så snart arbeidsflytforekomsten er inaktiv, når verten kaller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Unload%2A?displayProperty=fullName>på arbeidsflytforekomsten, eller når en arbeidsflytforekomst avsluttes eller avsluttes.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Unload%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the workflow runtime engine semantics dictate that persistence should occur, the workflow runtime engine calls methods that are supplied by a persistence service to save state information about the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Når arbeidsflyten runtime motoren semantikk angir at utholdenhet skal skje, kaller arbeidsflyten runtime motoren metodene som er angitt av en utholdenhet-tjenesten for å lagre Tilstandsinformasjon om arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Likewise, when the workflow runtime engine needs to restore a previously persisted workflow instance, it calls methods that are supplied by the persistence service to load this state information.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte når arbeidsflyten runtime motoren må gjenopprette en tidligere fast arbeidsflytforekomst, kaller metodene som er angitt av utholdenhet-tjenesten for å laste inn opplysningene tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine handles all the semantics regarding when to perform persistence.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime motoren behandler alle semantikk om når til å utføre utholdenhet.

trans-unit.source: The persistence service handles actually saving and loading the workflow state information to or from a data store.
trans-unit.target: Utholdenhet-tjenesten behandler faktisk lagrer og laster inn arbeidsflyten statusinformasjon til eller fra et datalager.

trans-unit.source: You can create a persistence service by deriving a class from the WorkflowPersistenceService class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette en fast tjeneste ved å hente en klasse fra WorkflowPersistenceService-klassen.

trans-unit.source: You can add your persistence service to the workflow runtime engine by calling <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A> or by making an appropriate entry in the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til tjenesten utholdenhet arbeidsflyten runtime motoren ved å kalle <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>eller ved å velge en passende verdi i programmets konfigurasjonsfil.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.AddService%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> should only contain one persistence service.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>skal bare inneholde én fast-tjeneste.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: Windows Workflow Foundation provides the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> class, an out-of-box persistence service, which you can use as is or extend.
trans-unit.target: Windows-arbeidsflyten Foundation inneholder den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>klasse, en ut av-esken utholdenhet-tjeneste, som du kan bruke fordi eller utvide.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine has semantics for locking workflow state information for use in environments where persistence services that run in different processes might have access to a single data store.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime motoren har semantikk for låsing av arbeidsflyten tilstandsinformasjon for bruk i miljøer der utholdenhet tjenester som kjører i forskjellige prosesser kan ha tilgang til ett enkelt datalager.

trans-unit.source: The WorkflowPersistenceService class provides the capability to support this functionality of the workflow runtime engine by providing a parameter to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.SaveWorkflowInstanceState%2A> that specifies whether the state information of a workflow instance should be unlocked in the data store, and by providing a method <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.UnlockWorkflowInstanceState%2A> to unlock previously locked workflow state information.
trans-unit.target: Klassen WorkflowPersistenceService gir muligheten til å støtte denne funksjonaliteten av arbeidsflyten runtime engine ved å oppgi en parameter for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.SaveWorkflowInstanceState%2A>som angir om tilstandsinformasjon for en arbeidsflytforekomst skal være låst i datakilden, og ved å angi en annen metode <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.UnlockWorkflowInstanceState%2A>låst arbeidsflyten statusinformasjon til å låse opp tidligere.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.UnlockWorkflowInstanceState%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.SaveWorkflowInstanceState%2A>

trans-unit.source: In a persistence service that implements locking, a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.LoadWorkflowInstanceState%2A> should lock the state information for a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: I en fast-tjeneste som implementerer låsing, et kall til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.LoadWorkflowInstanceState%2A>må låse tilstandsinformasjon for en arbeidsflytforekomst.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.LoadWorkflowInstanceState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Your persistence service should throw a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException> if it fails to save state information to its data store or load state information from its data store.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesten utholdenhet bør iverksette en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException>Hvis den ikke lagre informasjon om som sitt datalager eller laste inn statusinformasjon fra sitt datalager.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException>

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine expects this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime motoren forventer dette problemet.

trans-unit.source: A batching mechanism is provided for services that use a durable store to save workflow state information.
trans-unit.target: En batching mekanisme er angitt for tjenester som bruker en robust butikk lagre informasjon om arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: It is important in these cases to maintain consistency between the durable store that is used by the persistence service and the internal state of the workflow runtime engine.
trans-unit.target: Det er viktig i disse tilfellene sikre konsekvens mellom den minneoptimaliserte lageret som brukes av tjenesten utholdenhet og den interne tilstanden arbeidsflyten runtime-motoren.

trans-unit.source: You can add functionality defined by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> interface to your service, and then participate in workflow transaction batching provided by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> by adding changes to your data store as work items to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til funksjonalitet som er definert av <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>grensesnittet til tjenesten, og deretter delta i arbeidsflyten transaksjonen bunkebehandling fra den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService>ved å legge til endringer i datalageret som arbeidselementer til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowCommitWorkBatchService> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>

trans-unit.source: The durable store itself should implement the <xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification> interface, so that workflow information is not persisted incorrectly in the event of a transaction rollback.
trans-unit.target: Robust butikken selve skal implementere den <xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification>grensesnitt, slik at informasjon om arbeidsflyt ikke er fast feil ved en tilbakerulling.</xref:System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.SaveCompletedContextActivity%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.SaveWorkflowInstanceState%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.SaveCompletedContextActivity%2A>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.SaveWorkflowInstanceState%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.SaveWorkflowInstanceState%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.SaveCompletedContextActivity%2A>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert i en avledet klasse, initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the serialized default form of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter serialiserte standardskjema for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> whose serialized form is requested.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> der serialisert form forespørres.

trans-unit.source: The serialized default form of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Serialiserte standardskjema for den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the given activity is blocked.
trans-unit.target: Angir om den angitte aktiviteten er blokkert.

trans-unit.source: The root activity of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Root aktiviteten til arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the given activity is blocked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte aktiviteten blir blokkert; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the termination or suspend information of the given activity.
trans-unit.target: Henter avslutning eller utsette informasjon for den angitte aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: The root activity of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Root aktiviteten til arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the termination or suspend information.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder avslutning eller utsette informasjon.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the status of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Henter status for arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: The root activity of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Root aktiviteten til arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"></xref> enumeration value that denotes the status of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus"> </xref> opplistingsverdi som angir statusen for arbeidsflyten.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, loads the specified completed scope back into memory.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert i en avledet klasse, laster du det angitte fullstendige omfanget tilbake i minnet.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine uses LoadCompletedContextActivity to implement compensation.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime motoren bruker LoadCompletedContextActivity implementere kompensasjon.

trans-unit.source: You must restore an identical copy of the completed scope.
trans-unit.target: Du må gjenopprette en identisk kopi av det fullstendige omfanget.

trans-unit.source: To do this, you must restore a valid <xref:System.IO.Stream> from your representation of the completed scope in the data store.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gjøre dette, må du gjenopprette en gyldig <xref:System.IO.Stream>fra din representasjon av fullførte omfanget dataene lagres.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Then you must pass this <xref:System.IO.Stream> to one of the overloaded methods of <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Load%2A> to perform deserialization of the scope.
trans-unit.target: Deretter må du sende denne <xref:System.IO.Stream>til en av overbelastede metoder for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Load%2A>til å utføre deserialisering av omfanget.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Load%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: If your persistence service cannot load the completed scope from its data store, it should throw a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException> with an appropriate message.
trans-unit.target: Hvis utholdenhet-tjenesten ikke kan laste inn det fullstendige området fra sitt datalager, bør den iverksette en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException>med en melding.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the completed scope.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Guid>omfanget som er fullført.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that represents the activity that encloses the completed scope.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> som representerer aktiviteten som omslutter fullstendige omfanget.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that represents the completed scope.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> som representerer fullstendige omfanget.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, loads the specified state of the workflow instance back into memory.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert i en avledet klasse, laster du den angitte tilstanden til arbeidsflytforekomsten tilbake i minnet.

trans-unit.source: You must restore an identical copy of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Du må gjenopprette en identisk kopi av aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: To do this, you must restore a valid <xref:System.IO.Stream> from your representation of the workflow instance in the data store; then you must pass this <xref:System.IO.Stream> to one of the overloaded <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Load%2A> methods to deserialize the workflow instance state.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil gjøre dette, må du gjenopprette en gyldig <xref:System.IO.Stream>fra din representasjon av arbeidsflytforekomsten i datalageret; du må sende denne <xref:System.IO.Stream>til en av de overbelastet <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Load%2A>metoder deserialisering arbeidsflyten serverforekomsten tilstand.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Load%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: If your persistence service cannot load the workflow instance state from its data store, it should throw a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException> with an appropriate message.
trans-unit.target: Hvis utholdenhet-tjenesten ikke kan laste inn tilstanden arbeidsflyten forekomst fra sitt datalager, bør den iverksette en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException>med en melding.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException>

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine implements locking semantics to restrict access to a workflow instance state that is saved in a data store.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime motoren implementerer låsetillatelse semantikk for å begrense tilgangen til statusen for arbeidsflyt-forekomst som er lagret i et datalager.

trans-unit.source: This can be accessed by persistence services that run in multiple processes.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan få tilgang til vedvarende tjenester som kjører i flere prosesser.

trans-unit.source: The locking semantics are designed to prevent persistence services that run in two different processes from loading the same workflow instance into memory at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Semantikk for låsetillatelse er utformet for å forhindre utholdenhet tjenester som kjører i to ulike prosesser innlastingen av samme arbeidsflytforekomsten i minnet samtidig.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the type of environment that your persistence service is designed to support, you may choose whether to support this functionality.
trans-unit.target: Avhengig miljøet at din utholdenhet er utformet for å støtte, kan du velge om å støtte denne funksjonaliteten.

trans-unit.source: If you choose to support the runtime locking semantics, and if this workflow instance state has been previously locked by another process, then you should throw a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger å støtte låsetillatelse semantikk for kjøring, og hvis problemet arbeidsflyten forekomsten tidligere er låst av en annen prosess, bør deretter du iverksette <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, you should lock access to the workflow instance state in your data store.
trans-unit.target: Ellers bør du låse tilgang til tilstanden arbeidsflyten forekomst i datalageret.

trans-unit.source: The workflow instance state can be unlocked by a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.UnlockWorkflowInstanceState%2A> or a call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.SaveWorkflowInstanceState%2A> with the unlock parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden for arbeidsflyten forekomsten kan låses av et kall til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.UnlockWorkflowInstanceState%2A>eller et kall til <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.SaveWorkflowInstanceState%2A>med unlock-parameteren som er angitt til `true`.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.SaveWorkflowInstanceState%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.UnlockWorkflowInstanceState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the root activity of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Guid>på roten aktiviteten til arbeidsflytforekomsten.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that represents the root activity of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> som representerer roten aktiviteten til arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Restores the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> from its serialized form.
trans-unit.target: Gjenoppretter den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> fra det serialiserte skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: The serialized form of <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Serialiserte formatet <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The outer <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>, containing the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> to restore.
trans-unit.target: Ytterste <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>, som inneholder den <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> til å gjenopprette.

trans-unit.source: The restored <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den gjenopprettede <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, saves the specified completed scope to a data store.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert i en avledet klasse, blir det angitte fullstendige omfanget til en datalageret.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine saves the state of completed scope activities in order to implement compensation.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime motoren lagrer statusen til fullstendige omfanget aktiviteter for å implementere kompensasjon.

trans-unit.source: You must call one of the overloaded <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Save%2A> methods to serialize `activity` into a <xref:System.IO.Stream>; you may then choose to additionally process the <xref:System.IO.Stream> before writing it to your data store.
trans-unit.target: Du må kalle en av de overbelastet <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Save%2A>metoder for å serialisere `activity` til en <xref:System.IO.Stream>; deretter kan du velge å behandle i tillegg av <xref:System.IO.Stream>før skriving til datalageret.</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, when the workflow runtime engine calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.LoadCompletedContextActivity%2A>, you must restore an identical copy of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid når arbeidsflyten runtime motoren kaller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.LoadCompletedContextActivity%2A>, må du gjenopprette en identisk kopi av aktiviteten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.LoadCompletedContextActivity%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must be able to associate the completed scope with its enclosing workflow instance to mark the scope as unneeded in your data store when the workflow instance finishes or is terminated.
trans-unit.target: Du må kunne knytte fullstendige omfanget den omsluttende arbeidsflytforekomsten å merke omfanget som trenger datalageret når arbeidsflytforekomsten avsluttes eller er avsluttet.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should also save the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance that is associated with the completed scope; this can be obtained from the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A> property of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> associated with `activity`.
trans-unit.target: Derfor bør du også lagre den <xref:System.Guid>til arbeidsflytforekomsten som er knyttet til det fullstendige omfanget; dette kan hente fra den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A>for den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance>knyttet til `activity`.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.InstanceId%2A> </xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.LoadCompletedContextActivity%2A> takes the <xref:System.Guid> of the completed scope as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.LoadCompletedContextActivity%2A>tar i <xref:System.Guid>fullstendige omfanget som en parameter.</xref:System.Guid></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.LoadCompletedContextActivity%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must also save the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.ContextGuid%2A> property associated with `activity`.
trans-unit.target: Derfor må du også lagre den <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.ContextGuid%2A>egenskapen tilknyttet `activity`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.ContextGuid%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can be referenced through the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ActivityContextGuidProperty> field of `activity`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan refereres til av <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ActivityContextGuidProperty>for `activity`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.ActivityContextGuidProperty>

trans-unit.source: If you are implementing a persistence service that uses a durable store, to maintain consistency with the internal state of the workflow runtime engine, you should participate in workflow transaction batching to defer the actual write to your durable store until a workflow commit point.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du implementere en fast-tjeneste som bruker en robust butikk, for å beholde konsekvensen med den interne tilstanden arbeidsflyten runtime-motoren skal du delta i arbeidsflyten transaksjonen bunkebehandling for å utsette den faktiske skrivingen til i minneoptimaliserte store før en arbeidsflyt-commit datapunkt.

trans-unit.source: To participate in batching, add a work item to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A> property that represents the pending changes to the database, and implement the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> interface in your persistence service.
trans-unit.target: Legg til et arbeidselement til å delta i bunkebehandling, den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>-egenskap som representerer de ventende endringene til databasen, og implementere den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>grensesnittet i din utholdenhet.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you cannot save the completed scope to your data store, you should throw a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException> with an appropriate error message.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke kan lagre det fullstendige omfanget datalageret, bør du iverksette en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException>med en passende feilmelding.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that represents the completed scope.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> som representerer fullstendige omfanget.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, saves the workflow instance state to a data store.
trans-unit.target: Når implementert i en avledet klasse, lagrer du tilstanden arbeidsflyten forekomsten til en datalageret.

trans-unit.source: You must call one of the overloaded <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Save%2A> methods to serialize `rootActivity` into a <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Du må kalle en av de overbelastet <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Save%2A>metoder for å serialisere `rootActivity` til <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Save%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can then choose to additionally process the <xref:System.IO.Stream> before writing it to your data store.
trans-unit.target: Deretter kan du velge å behandle i tillegg av <xref:System.IO.Stream>før skriving til datalageret.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: However, when the workflow runtime engine calls <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.LoadWorkflowInstanceState%2A>, you must restore an identical copy of the root activity.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid når arbeidsflyten runtime motoren kaller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.LoadWorkflowInstanceState%2A>, må du gjenopprette en identisk kopi av aktiviteten roten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.LoadWorkflowInstanceState%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you cannot save the workflow instance state to your data store, you should throw a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException> with an appropriate error message.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke kan lagre tilstanden arbeidsflyten forekomsten datalageret, bør du iverksette en <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException>med en passende feilmelding.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.PersistenceException>

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine provides locking semantics to restrict access to a workflow instance state that is saved in the data store.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime engine gir låsetillatelse semantikk for å begrense tilgangen til statusen for arbeidsflyt-forekomst som er lagret i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: This can be accessed by the persistence services running in multiple hosts and pointing to the same data store.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan få tilgang til vedvarende-tjenestene kjører i flere verter og peker til samme datalageret.

trans-unit.source: The locking semantics are designed to prevent persistence services that run in two different workflow runtimes from loading the same workflow instance into memory at the same time.
trans-unit.target: Semantikk for låsetillatelse er utformet for å forhindre utholdenhet tjenestene som kjøres i to ulike arbeidsflyten kjøretidsfiler innlastingen av samme arbeidsflytforekomsten i minnet samtidig.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the type of environment your persistence service is designed to support, you can choose whether to support this functionality.
trans-unit.target: Avhengig av miljøet utholdenhet tjenesten er utformet for å støtte, kan du velge om å støtte denne funksjonaliteten.

trans-unit.source: If you choose to support the runtime locking semantics, then, if a persistence service tries to save a workflow instance state that has been previously locked by another persistence service, you should throw a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger å støtte låsetillatelse semantikk for kjøring, da bør ingen fast tjeneste prøver å lagre en arbeidsflyt forekomsttilstand som tidligere har blitt låst av en annen utholdenhet tjeneste du iverksette <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowOwnershipException>

trans-unit.source: If `unlock` is `true`, you should unlock access to the workflow instance state after you save it.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `unlock` er `true`, du må låse opp tilgang til tilstanden arbeidsflyten forekomsten når du lagrer den.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.LoadWorkflowInstanceState%2A> takes the <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.LoadWorkflowInstanceState%2A>tar i <xref:System.Guid>til arbeidsflytforekomsten som en parameter.</xref:System.Guid></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.LoadWorkflowInstanceState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you should save this <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: Derfor bør du lagre <xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this <xref:System.Guid> to associate the workflow instance with the saved states of its completed scopes.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke dette <xref:System.Guid>å knytte arbeidsflytforekomsten til lagret tilstander for de fullstendige omfangene.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: You must do this because you must be able to mark these completed scopes as unneeded when the workflow instance completes.
trans-unit.target: Du må gjøre dette fordi du må kunne merke disse fullstendige omfang som trenger når arbeidsflytforekomsten er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime engine calls SaveWorkflowInstanceState a final time when the workflow instance is completed or terminated.
trans-unit.target: Arbeidsflyten runtime motoren kaller SaveWorkflowInstanceState en siste gang når arbeidsflytforekomsten er fullført eller avsluttet.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.GetWorkflowStatus%2A> is equal to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>, you can safely delete the workflow instance and all its associated completed scopes from your data store.
trans-unit.target: Derfor Hvis <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.GetWorkflowStatus%2A>er lik <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus>, kan du trygt slette arbeidsflytforekomsten og alle de tilknyttede fullstendige omfangene fra datalageret.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowStatus> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.GetWorkflowStatus%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can subscribe to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowCompleted> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated> events to determine when it is safe to delete records associated with the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Alternativt kan du abonnere på de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowCompleted>eller <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated>hendelser til å bestemme når det er trygt å slette poster som er knyttet til arbeidsflytforekomsten.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Whether you actually delete the records from your data store depends on your implementation.
trans-unit.target: Om du faktisk sletter postene fra datalageret avhenger av implementeringen din.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a persistence service that uses a durable store, then, to maintain consistency with the internal state of the workflow runtime engine, you should participate in workflow transaction batching to defer the actual write to your durable store until a workflow commit point.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har implementert en fast-tjeneste som bruker en robust butikk, deretter skal for å beholde konsekvensen med den interne tilstanden arbeidsflyten runtime-motoren du delta i arbeidsflyten transaksjonen bunkebehandling for å utsette den faktiske skrivingen til i minneoptimaliserte store før en arbeidsflyt-commit datapunkt.

trans-unit.source: To participate in batching, add a work item that represents the pending changes to your durable store to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A> property, and implement the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> interface in your persistence service.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil delta i bunkebehandling, legge til et arbeidselement som representerer de ventende endringene til robust store for å den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>egenskapen og Implementer den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork>grensesnittet i din utholdenhet.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowEnvironment.WorkBatch%2A>

trans-unit.source: The root activity of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Root aktiviteten til arbeidsflytforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow instance should not be locked; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the workflow instance should be locked.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis arbeidsflytforekomsten ikke bør låses; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis arbeidsflytforekomsten skal låses.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a workflow should be unloaded when idle.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om en arbeidsflyt skal være utlastet når inaktiv.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that represents the completed scope.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> som representerer fullstendige omfanget.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the workflow runtime engine unloads the specified workflow when it becomes idle.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, arbeidsflyt runtime motoren fjerner angitt arbeidsflyten når den er inaktiv.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, unlocks the workflow instance state.
trans-unit.target: Når overstyrt i en avledet klasse, låses tilstanden for arbeidsflyt-forekomst.

trans-unit.source: This method is abstract, so it does not contain a default implementation on locking and unlocking.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er abstrakt, slik at den ikke inneholder en standard implementering på låse og låse opp.

trans-unit.source: While implementing a custom persistence service, if you want to implement a locking scheme you will need to override this method and provide a locking-unlocking mechanism in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.SaveWorkflowInstanceState%2A> method based on the value of the unlock parameter.
trans-unit.target: Under implementering av en egendefinert utholdenhet-tjeneste, hvis du vil implementere en låsetillatelse skjemaet må overstyre denne metoden og mekanisme låsing låse opp i den <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.SaveWorkflowInstanceState%2A>metoden basert på verdien for parameteren unlock.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService.SaveWorkflowInstanceState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The root activity of the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Root aktiviteten til arbeidsflytforekomsten.
